titleStmt.title: The Humble petition of the well-affected of the county of South-Hampton in behalf of the ministers of the Gospel and for continuance of their maintenance. With Mr. Recorders speech. And the Parliaments answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Hooper, Cornelius.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Ibbitson dwelling in Smithfield neer Hosier Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
